title: Autofilling forms does not work on local server
content:
I have a local server where I host several apps (URLs such as http://192.168.0.101/). I've noticed that Firefox will not offer to autocomplete text boxes and forms on local pages.

I have the "Firefox will Remember history" option enabled, and autofill works elsewhere as expected.
creator: sm8d9ff8v4

title: No puedo cambiar la configuración de acceso proxy a Internet
content: Buenas. No puedo cambiar la configuración de acceso proxy a Internet, me salen todas las opciones bloqueadas, ¿como puedo habilitarlas de nuevo? Adjunto pantallazo de la configuración. Muchas gracias y saludos.
creator: antonio.pujan96

title: Firefox opens up a second browser screen automatically when I am already in a website!
content: When I login to my main Firefox browser and then access a website within a short while the browser screen opens up again automatically. In other words, a second window which is very irritating. How can I stop this from happening?
creator: graemesmith300653

title: disableing firefox from going into efficancy mode.
content: Hi how do I i prevent Firefox from going into efficiency mode. When Firefox goes into efficiency mode it be comes slow and unresponsive. if I manually uncheck efficiency mode in task manager Firefox becomes quicker and less laggy until a few seconds to minutes later it goes back into it. The performance of Firefox in efficiency mode makes it almost unusable and can take up to a minute for it to start working again.
creator: racing_4_fun

title: <Space> keystroke lags behind other keys
content: Hi,ey Since a while, whenever firefox starts lagging, the space key is registered after other keys are pressed. I.e. when i type something like "this is a test" i get something like "thisisat est"; the space key is taken into account but at some random moment after some other keys are taken into account. What couldbe the cause and what can I do to stop this ? Thanks ! Ted
creator: bdouilleur

title: Constant crashes
content: Firefox keeps crashing randomly, sometimes at startup, and sometimes just in the middle of a session. Sometimes just one tab will crash, and other times it'll be the entire browser. I ran it in troubleshoot mode and it still crashed, so it's not caused by an extension or anything. It never used to do this before and I don't understand what's causing this issue.
creator: everythinggreatandsome48

title: Why can I suddenly not sign in to Netflix?
content: bold text Tell me if the problem is caused by Firefox or Netflix.
creator: mattbentley611

title: Firefox flashes for a second when opening, then disappears
content:
I installed Firefox on my daughter's laptop (several times). Each time we try to open it, there is a quick flash of a window and then nothing. It does not not show up on the task manager. I restarted the computer. Reinstalled the program. And tried Refreshing it. I disabled pop-ups & deleted all anti-virus other than Defender. I tried setting firefox as default. Nothing worked. I am at the end of my knowledge. Would appreciate any help or ideas.

Thanks.
creator: morgan.colleen67

title: Browser is installed twice
content:
I have Firefox version 100.0 (64-bit) and version 122.0.1 (64-bit) installed somehow. Both versions when you click on Help>About Firefox say they are up to date.

I can uninstall the 122.0.1 version. I cannot uninstall the 100.0 version.

100.0 says it is up to date but in the top right corner there is a box that says: Update available Firefox couldn't update automatically. Download the new version - you won't lose saved information or customizations.

If I tell it to download I get the 122.0.1 version installed separately from the 100.0 version.

How do I get only ONE installation of Firefox?
creator: PissedTheEffOff

title: can't upload attachments
content: I am no longer able to add attachments to gmail or upload images or attachments to websites. When I click on the attachment icon or upload button, my finder window does not open. However, it works in other browsers. How can I fix this?
creator: core.empowerment

title: tidal max
content: Tidal's max sound quality can be played in Chrome and Vivaldi, but not in Firefox.
creator: axolotl2048

title: Repeating dns queries for same domains
content:
Hello, I have been looking at my traffic and discovered that my firefox for some reason does multiple DNS queries for the same domain, usually 6 times or 3 times, why is that happening I have checked with chrome and it does only 1 request per domain name.

I have attached a wireshark dump, the response is there instantly in very few ms yet it keeps querying the same name again.

My version is 115.3.1esr (64-bit) I have checked in about:config with dns and couldnt find anything relevant.
creator: xoxoxek

title: Video playback NY Times not working in v 122.0.1
content:
Video playback NY Times not working in v 122.0.1

Got error message from NYT: Video playback is not supported in your current browser TO view NYTimes video please upgrade your browser to the latest version
creator: wcolmers

title: MacOS notifications showing the icon for the wrong profile in the Notification Center.
content:
Basically, I have three different profiles in my Firefox with three different app icons, but only one of has notifications.

For some odd reason, the MacOS notification center is showing the wrong profile. It's like only one of the profiles is visible, or working. I tried resetting it, which is apples way of "deleting" it, but Firefox keeps forcing that particular profile and not my main one.

Firefox 122.0.1 (64-bit) MacOS Ventura 13.5.1 (22G90)
creator: thiagoperrysampaio

title: Edge Opens Links instead of default browser Firefox
content: Firefox is my default browser; however, when I click on a link, MS Edge opens it instead of Firefox even thought Firefox is already opened. How can I prevent that from happening?
creator: philselig
